loans.name: Ermogenes

texts.es:
Ermógenes, de 45 años, es un hombre bueno y trabajador, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene 3 hijos, quienes dependen de el para su educación, vive con su familia en una casa propia en donde comparte junto a su pareja la alegría de criar a sus hijos quienes son su motivo para seguir trabajando y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Ermógenes consiste en el transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi, el se levanta muy temprano para alistarse y salir a las diversas calles de la ciudad en busca de los eventuales pasajeros quienes requieren transportarse de un lugar a otro. Gracias a los 12 años que lleva realizando este trabajo ha aprendido a conocer a sus clientes y se ha ganado la confianza de muchos de ellos lo cual le permite ser solicitado para brindar servicios particulares siendo contratado por largas horas de trabajo. Su carisma y alegría son su principal arma para sobrellevar el día a día laboral y relacionarse mejor con sus pasajeros. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que el puede disponer de su tiempo ya que trabaja principalmente en horarios de mayor demanda del público que son en horas escolares de entrada a los colegios y centros de labores de las personas, el resto del día trabaja transitando por las distintas calles de la ciudad, le está yendo bien ya que como su mototaxi es propio no tiene que pagar a alguien por el alquiler, tiene como planes a futuro poder comprar dos mototaxis más para así ampliar su flota vehicular y poder alquilarlos. Este es el préstamo número 2 con MFP, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que siguen confiando en él para acceder nuevamente a este financiamiento que le ayudará a aumentar su capital de trabajo, sabe que nuevamente tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual, está contento de pertenecer su banco comunal ya que ve que son muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará algunas piezas y enviará su mototaxi al taller para que le hagan algunas reparaciones. Otra parte del dinero lo invertirá en pagar una fracción del monto solicitado por la compra de su siguiente mototaxi.
texts.en:
Ermógenes, 45 years old, is a good and hardworking man. He lives with his partner with whom he has three children who depend on him for their education. He lives with his family in his own house where he and his partner share the happiness of raising their children. Their children are the reason they continue to work and provide their family a better quality of life.

Ermógenes’ job is transporting passengers in his motor rickshaw. He gets up very early to get ready to leave for different streets in the city looking for possible passengers who need to get from one place to another. Thanks to the twelve years he has spent doing this work, he has come to know his customers and has earned the confidence of many of them. They ask to contract long hours of private service from him. His charisma and cheerfulness are his principal weapons in enduring day after day of work and in good relationships with his passengers.

What he enjoys in his work is that he can organize his time because he schedules work principally when there is greatest public demand, that is during school hours when children are going to school and when workers are going to their jobs. The rest of the working day is spent traveling through different streets of the city. He is doing well because he owns his motor rickshaw and does not have to pay to rent one. His future plans are to buy two more motor rickshaws in order to expand his fleet of vehicles so that he can rent them.

This is Ermógenes’ second loan with MFP and he is grateful to all the people who continue to have confidence in him so that he can obtain a new loan, which will help him increase his working capital. He knows that he will again have to be very responsible and punctual. He is happy to belong to his communal bank because everyone is very supportive.

With the sum requested, S/.1,200, he will purchase some parts and send his motor rickshaw  to the shop so they can make some repairs. He will use the rest of the money to pay off a bit of the cost of buying his next motor rickshaw.

loans.use: to purchase parts and send his motor rickshaw to the workshop so they can make some repairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en: Mary Jane a 41-year-old living in San Carlos, Tukuran. She provides for her child from the small sum of 6,000 PHP she earns monthly from the palay (rice) production business she has had for 10 years. Her business supplements the income her husband earns from fishing and farming. In 2011, Mary Jane joined GDMPC, and she is applying for a loan of 10,000 PHP to pay for the labor costs in rice harvesting. She wants to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs for rice harvesting.

loans.name: Rysbubu

texts.ru: Рысбубу 70 лет, замужем. Рысбубу является матерью героиней так как имеет 9 детей. Рысбубу имеет среднее образование после окончания школы она вышла замуж. Она с мужем являются пенсионерами, помимо пенсии источником дохода для их семьи является животноводство и полеводство.  Благодаря упорному труду Рысбубу и её мужа в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 1 дойные коровы, 1 теленок, 10 овец. Также, Рысбубу обрабатывает 2,8 га земли, где выращивает  фасоль и картофель.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рысбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота – молодняка для откорма и перепродажи. От продажи молока получают дополнительный доходю Доходы от кредита Рысбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Rysbubu is 70 years old, and is married. She is a heroic mother, for she has 9 children. Rysbubu has a high school education, and got married after she graduated. Both she and her husband are now retired, and aside from their pension, their main source of income comes from raising livestock and growing crops. Thanks to their hard work, Rysbubu and her husband now have 1 dairy cow, 1 calf, and 10 sheep on their farm. Rysbubu also cultivates 2.8 hectares of land, where she grows beans and potatoes. With the goal of expanding her business, Rysbubu turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 some (KGS) to purchase young livestock for fattening and resale. They also receive additional income from selling milk. Rysbubu plans on investing the money earned from the loan into increasing the number of domestic livestock.

loans.use: To purchase more livestock

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, tiene 29 años, es una mujer humilde, optimista y muy trabajadora, tiene una relación con David de 32 años con quien tiene una hija fruto de su amor de 7 años llamada Milena, por quien se esfuerza y se sacrifica día a día trabajando arduamente para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida, actualmente viven en una casa propia, la que ha logrado conseguir con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación, ahí comparten sus días como una familia unida. Carmen dedica su tiempo laboral principalmente a la venta de repuestos, piezas y accesorios para todo tipo de vehículos, básicamente para mototaxis, asimismo realiza funciones de mantenimiento y reparaciones de mototaxis que presentan algunas deficiencias en su funcionamiento y gracias a la excelente calidad con la que realiza su trabajo es considerada como una de las mejores en éste rubro y se ha convertido en una de las más conocidas de la ciudad, fama que comparte con su esposo David, quien también trabaja junto a ella desde que se inició el negocio hace 2 años. Tienen muchos clientes y siempre es muy recomendada, esto  le genera seguridad y estabilidad económica ya que a diario la fluidez de la clientela es alta, éste trabajo lo realizan en un local que alquilaron juntos y aunque al principio fue un poco difícil por el temor y las dudas que sentían, no se dejaron amilanar y hoy por hoy siguen adelante con el deseo de seguir creciendo.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es ver que sus clientes se sienten contentos cuando observan que los vehículos terminan en buenas condiciones y funcionando a la perfección, satisfacción que ella conoce y comparte de cerca ya que también tiene 2 mototaxis, su gran meta es conseguir un local más grande en el que pueda brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes y donde pueda contar con una mayor cantidad de repuestos de distintas marcas ya sea para ofrecerlos en venta como también con los que pueda continuar realizando un buen trabajo de reparación. Con el monto solicitado (S/.1000), incrementará su stock de repuestos, piezas, accesorios y herramientas en su taller, entre ellos: cámaras, rodajes, llantas, pernos, aceites entre otros, de distintas marcas.
texts.en:
Carmen, 29, is a modest, optimistic, and very hardworking woman.  She's in a relationship with David, 32.  Together they have a child from their love, Milena, age 7, for whom she works hard and makes sacrifices every day.  She works hard to be able to give her a better quality of life.  Currently they live in their own house, which she got with so much effort and dedication.  There they share their days as a close family.

Carmen makes a living mainly selling parts, components, and accessories for all types of vehicles, basically for motorcycle taxis.  She also performs  maintenance and repair on motorcycle taxis that have operating defects.  Thanks to the excellent quality of her work she's recognized as one of the best in this area and has become one of the best known in the city.  She shares this renown with her husband David, who also has worked with her since she started the business two years ago.

They have a lot of customers and she's always highly recommended.  This generates security and financial stability because the flow of customers is high every day.  They do this job in a place they rented together and although in the beginning it was a bit difficult because they were worried and had doubts, they didn't allow themselves to be frightened, and now they're making progress and want to continue growing.

What she likes most about her job is seeing that her customers are happy when they observe that the vehicles end up in good condition and functioning perfectly.  This is a satisfaction she knows and shares up close because she also has two motorcycle taxis.  Her big goal is to get a bigger place where she can offer better customer service and have more spare parts in various brands, whether to sell them or to continue doing good repair work.

With the requested amount of 1000 soles (PEN) she'll increase her stock of spare parts, components, accessories, and tools in her shop, including chambers, gears, tires, bolts, oil, and other parts in various brands.

loans.use: to buy chambers, gears, tires, bolts, oil, and other spare parts

loans.name: Muborak

texts.ru: Муборак женщина с прекрасной душой и прекрасными мыслями. Ей 24 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Его муж уехал Российскою Федерацию, но не отравляет достаточно денег, чтобы она могла купить все не обходимые средства для проживания. Мубораку нужно источник дохода и это стало причиной для идеи организовать новый бизнес. Она узнала от своей соседки и еще подробней прочла в рекламе о  курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин, который учить женщин как создать бизнес план и организовать бизнес. Она участвовала в этом курсе и получила сертификат. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей скота. Она будет покупать скот, присматривать  за ним несколько месяцев и продавать на местном рынке по более высокой цене, чем она его приобрела. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своего ребенка с хорошим условием проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  500сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muborak is a woman with a great spirit and wonderful ideas. She is 24 years old, married, and has one child. Her husband has gone to the Russian Federation, but he doesn't send back enough money for her to make ends meet. Muborak needs a source of income, and this became the reason behind the idea of starting a new business.  She found out from a neighbor about a course organized by the Association of Businesswomen called "Achieve success", and read more about it in an ad. She took the course and receive a certificate. She wants to start a business selling livestock. She will buy the animals, take care of them for several months, and then sell them at the local market at a profit. She plans on using the income to improve her and her child's living conditions. She is asking for a loan in the amount of 500 somons to buy livestock in order to start her new business, She looks forward to your kindness.

loans.use: To buy livestock for organizing a new business

loans.name: Tahmina

texts.ru:
Тахмине 26 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Она живет с своим ребенком, так как ее муж уехал в Российскую Федерацию и является трудовым мигрантом. Тахмина должна сама справляться со всеми расходами, так как ее муж не отправляет достаточно денег. Тахмина решила организовать свой бизнес и таким образом зарабатывать на жизнь.
С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей скота, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своего ребенка с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Tahmina is 26, married, and has one child. She lives with her child; her husband is went to the Russian Federation as a migrant worker. Tahmina has to handle all of the expenses, because her husband does not send her enough money. Tahmina decided to form her own business and thereby earn a living. WIth this goal, she took a course called "Achieve Success" organized by the Association of Businesswomen and received a certificate of completion. Now she is fully able to organize her business and become successful. She wants to form a business selling livestock, since she has experience in this type of work. She plans to use the income she earns to ensure that her child gets a good education and a good diet. She is asking for a loan of 500 somons to purchase livestock animals to start her new business. She looks forward to your kindness.

loans.use: To buy livestock for organizing a new business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his vehicle

loans.name: Avelino

texts.es:
Avelino, de 42 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ocoro - Colcabamba. Durante la mañana, desde muy temprano. Avelino se dedica al cultivo de diversos productos agrícolas como maíz y papa, que son su principal sustento económico. Gusta de cultivar y mantener los surcos de sus sembríos alineados y en buen estado de esa manera, asegura una buena cosecha, con productos de primera calidad. Además de ser una de las personas más carismáticas y en la negociación de sus cultivos constantemente recibe buenas utilidades, por ese poder de negociación. Además cuenta que desea mejorar sus ganancias para poder comprar nuevos terrenos agrícolas. Sabe que lo conseguirá pues tiene la convicción de mejorar sus sembríos y de trabajar sin cansancio. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada y feliz, ya que espera obtener el préstamo para continuar con sus objetivos. Además promete pagar puntual sus cuotas. Pues es una persona responsable y solidaria.
Avelino, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico para esparcir entre sus sembríos de maíz
texts.en:
Avelino is 42 years old and is a very responsable man who lives with his wife and children in a home of his own, located in Ocoro – Colcabamba.  Very early each morning, Avelino raises different farm products such as corn and potatoes, which is his main financial support.  He likes caring for his crops and in this way ensures a good harvest of quality products.

Aside from being of good character he is a good negotiator and this talent has brought him good rewards.  He wants to increase his earnings so that he can buy new farmland.  He knows that he will achieve it and has the conviction to improve his crops and to work without tiring.  This will be his fourth loan through MFP and he feels happy that it will help him continue with his objectives.  He also promises to make his payments on time.  He is a responsible person.

Avelino will invest the money from this loan to buy compost to spread on his corn crops.

loans.use: to buy compost.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia, de 48 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su esposo Zosimo y 3 de sus 9 hijos: Maicol, Fidel y Yanela, a los que cuida en una casa alquilada desde hace 13 años. Desde hace 20 años se dedica a la agricultura, sus padre le inculcaron los valores desde pequeña, ya que siempre disfrutó de caminar por las pradera. Posee terrenos agrícolas propios, los cuales cuida con mucho esmero, ya que se ubican al costado del río, “son muy productivos, obtengo buenos ingresos pues gracias al riego son de buena calidad”, afirma. Las verduras que produce los comercializan a la ciudad de Lima, donde tiene clientes fijos, asimismo cría animales, los cuales le brindan un ingreso adicional, que le ayuda a mantener la economía del hogar de manera permanente. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Ullusca” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, por lo que agradece el apoyo financiero brindado, pues le ayuda a mejorar su negocio. Por esa razón, promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Sonia, invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus próximos sembríos.
texts.en:
Sonia is 48 years old and is a hardworking woman.  For 13 years she has lived in a rented home with her husband, Zosimo and her three of her nine children: Maicol, Fidel, and Yanela.  She has been farming for the past 20 years.  Her parents instilled this in her when she was little and she has always enjoyed walking through the meadow.  She has her own farmland, located along the river banks, and she cares for with great enthusiasm.  “It is very productive and I have gotten a good income thanks to the soil being of good quality,” she says.

She sells the vegetables in Lima, where she has steady customers.  She also raises animals which provide her an additional income that helps her maintain the household finances steady.  She is grateful for the support because it has helped her to improve her business.  For this reason she promises to make her payments on time.  Sonia will use the money to buy compost to feed her next planting.

loans.use: to buy compost

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for the maintenance of his motorcycle

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La señora Gladys es una persona artesana de la ciudad de Ibarra, ella vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos ella se define como una persona de carácter alegre, humilde y muy trabajadora, comenta que el trabajo es la base para construir sus sueños y el de sus hijos. 

El crédito que Doña Gladys solicito a Fodemi se lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para la realización de su trabajo como es cera de zapatos, betunes, pintura y gamuza para zapatos, ya que su trabajo está siendo muy reconocido en su ciudad y cada vez tiene más clientes por que ven en ella una persona emprendedora

El sueño que Doña Gladys tiene es tener un su propio negocio de venta de comida en su casa, ella sabe que su trabajo le a dado muchas satisfacciones así que el sueño que doña Gladys tiene muy pronto será una realidad
texts.en:
Gladys is an artisan from the city of Ibarra.  She lives with her husband and her children.  She is a happy, modest, and very hardworking person.  She says that work is the basis for building her dreams and her children's dreams.

Gladys will invest the loan she requested from FODEMI in buying materials to do her job as a shoeshiner: wax, polish, paint, and chamois cloths for shoes.

Her work is being more recognized in the city and she has more customers all the time because they see her as an enterprising person.

Gladys's dream is to have her own business selling food in her house.  She knows her job has given her a lot of satisfaction, so her dream will be a reality very soon.

loans.use: to buy wax, polish, paint, and chamois cloths for shoes

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Rocío, de 22 años es una señorita responsable. Vive en compañía de su mamá y sus hermanos en una casa alquilada desde hace 10 años. Hace algunos años, tuvo la idea de abrir una peluquería en sociedad con su mamá, pues siempre quiso tener un negocio propio que le brinde las ganancias necesarias para ayudar a su familia. Desde adolescente trabajó en ventas y servicios, por lo que tuvo la idea de aplicar su conocimiento en lo que más sabe. Su peluquería se ubica en una zona céntrica de la ciudad, por lo que tiene buena acogida, la principal dificultad es el espacio pues es muy pequeño, tiene planeado ahorrar lo necesario para alquilar un local amplio donde pueda brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Manantiales de Ullusca” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, por lo que agradece el apoyo financiero brindado, pues le ayuda a mejorar su negocio. Por esa razón, promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Rocío, invertirá el dinero en la compra de peines, cepillos y demás insumos para su peluquería.
texts.en:
Rocío is 22 years old and a very responsible young woman.  She has been living with her mother and brothers in a rented home for the past 10 years.  A few years ago she got the idea to open a salon in partnership with her mother.  She always wanted to have her own business that would produce the necessary income to help her family.

She has been working in sales and services since she was a teenager and she decided to apply what she knew.  Her salon is located in the city’s central zone and it is welcomed there.  Her main difficulty is that the space is very small.  She plans to rent a spacious salon where she can provide better service to her customers.

She is a member of the “Manantiales de Ullusca” communal bank and this will be her sixth loan through MFP.  She is grateful for the financial support.  It will help her improve her business, so she promises to make her payments on time.

Rocío will invest the money from this loan to buy combs, brushes, and other supplies.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for the maintenance of his motorcycle

loans.name: Filpres

texts.en: Filpres, who is 34 years old, is a married entrepreneur from San Carlos, Tukuran, and has one child. He earns a living from his motorcycle transportation business. He has been operating this for almost 10 years now, and he earns 4,000 PHP a month. To improve his business, he is borrowing 7,000 PHP from GDMPC, which he just joined recently, to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. Soon, Filpres hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es:
La Sra. Janeth indudablemente es una persona de admiración, siempre con una sonrisa y alegría que le caracteriza, ella se define como una persona, paciente humilde y muy trabajadora. Ella confía mucho en su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante, Dona Janeth ama a sus dos hijas por las cuales lucha día a día


El crédito solicitado a Fodemi se lo va a invertir en la compra de trajes de indígenas ecuatorianos ya que en su local de alquiler de ropa, estas prendas son muy solicitadas y es una oportunidad de crecimiento de su negocio, es por ello que la Sra. Janeth está muy gustosa y con ganas de salir adelante.

El sueño de Janeth es poder tener un local propio y amplio donde pueda tener la mayor cantidad de disfraces y ser muy reconocida en la ciudad de Ibarra y con estos ingresos mejorar su casa y darles la educación a sus hijas que dependen de ella, Janeth tiene fe que con trabajo y amor su sueño se cumplirá.
texts.en:
La Sra. Janeth indudablemente es una persona de admiración, siempre con una sonrisa y alegría que le caracteriza, ella se define como una persona, paciente humilde y muy trabajadora. Ella confía mucho en su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante, Dona Janeth ama a sus dos hijas por las cuales lucha día a día

El crédito solicitado a Fodemi se lo va a invertir en la compra de trajes de indígenas ecuatorianos ya que en su local de alquiler de ropa, estas prendas son muy solicitadas y es una oportunidad de crecimiento de su negocio, es por ello que la Sra. Janeth está muy gustosa y con ganas de salir adelante.

El sueño de Janeth es poder tener un local propio y amplio donde pueda tener la mayor cantidad de disfraces y ser muy reconocida en la ciudad de Ibarra y con estos ingresos mejorar su casa y darles la educación a sus hijas que dependen de ella, Janeth tiene fe que con trabajo y amor su sueño se cumplirá.

loans.use: to buy costumes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Triunfadoras De Oquendo Group

texts.es:
Kelly  es uno de los miembros del Grupo Triunfadoras de Oquendo

Kelly de 31 años es casada, tiene 02 hijos de 05 y 08 respectivamente. Ella vive con su mama y su hermana, actualmente tiene una bodega  en su casa, antes de iniciar este negocio trabajaba vendiendo ropa por pedido, pero no le fue muy bien porque muchas clientas le demoraban en pagar; fue así que hace 02 años decidió empezar su bodega; al principio con muy pocos productos pero poco a poco mejorando, en la actualidad tiene toda clase de productos comestibles, bebidas y tarjetas telefónicas. Kelly trabaja en la bodega de 10 a 12 horas diarias, cuenta con la ayuda de su madre que muchas veces queda a cargo del negocio, con el préstamo obtenido de EDAPROSPO podrá comprar productos navideños como panetones, chocolates y leche. Más adelante Kelly  desea abrir  una tienda de ropa en un lugar céntrico, para poder cumplir ese propósito quiere seguir ahorrando, también continuara con su bodega que le permite ayudar en la economía de su familia.
Kelly agradece a los Inversionistas de todo el mundo por permitir que ella y todo su grupo puedan seguir progresando, en la foto ella viste casaca de buzo color negro con verde.
*En la foto de la derecha aparecen 02 socias las Sras.  Delsy y Agapita
texts.en:
Kelly, 31, is one of the members of Truinfadoras de Oquendo Group.  She's married and has two children, ages 5 and 8.  She lives with her mother and her sister.

Currently she has a grocery store in her house.  Before starting this business she worked selling clothing on order, but it didn't go very well for her because a lot of customers delayed in paying.  This was how she decided to start her grocery store two years ago, with very few products in the beginning but improving little by little.  Now she has all types of food products, beverages, and telephone cards.  Kelly works in the store 10-12 hours a day.  Her mother helps her, often taking charge of the business.

With the loan from EDAPROSPO she'll be able to buy Christmas products such as panettone, chocolate, and milk.

In the future Kelly wants to open a clothing store in a central location.  She wants to continue saving so she can achieve this goal.  She also will continue with her store, which allows her to help with the family finances.

Kelly's grateful to the lenders around the world for allow her and her entire group to be able to continue making progress.  In the photograph she's wearing a black and green sweatsuit jacket. 

In the photo on the right are two members, Delsy and Agapita.

loans.use: to buy Christmas products

loans.name: Las Tejedoras Del Ñanduti 2 Group

texts.es:
Las señoras del comité Las tejedoras de ñanduti II, son personas muy trabajadoras, ellas están muy agradecidas con la fundación porque gracias al apoyo que reciben pueden invertir en sus negocios, y quienes son nuevas pueden empezar a trabajar.
La presidenta, la señora Blanca vive con su marido e hijos, ella se dedica a la artesanía en ñanduti. Ella junto con sus compañeras realiza constantes actividades y de ese modo fomentar la integración entre las compañeras y tratar de adelantar sus cuotas. La Sra. Blanca es una persona con un gran entusiasmo y quiere salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita de este crédito para la compra de hilos y agujas para poder seguir haciendo sus tejidos de ñanduti. Agradece el grupo por toda la oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The women of the “Las Tejedoras de ñanduti II” are very hardworking and grateful to the foundation.  They are able to invest in their businesses, thanks to the support they receive.  Those who are new can also begin to work.

Blanca, the group’s president, lives with her husband and does ñanduti arts and crafts.  She, along with her fellow members, work constantly and in this way integrate their work and try to get ahead in their payments.  Blanca is a person of great enthusiasm who wants to come out ahead and help her family.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy needles and thread so that she can continue to make her ñanduti crafts.  She is grateful to the group for the opportunity she has received, as it will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to buy needles and thread.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El Comité Kuña Guapa está integrado por 10 señoras quienes se encuentra en el 2º ciclo y se formo con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní.  Una de estas mujeres es la Sra. Gabriela , ella se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas junto con su marido y sus 2 hijos, gracias al esfuerzo de ella y de su marido dan a sus hijos todo lo que necesitan para tener una vida digna y sin privaciones como las que ellos tuvieron que pasar.Gabriela comenta que su negocio está muy bien, ya que las ventas de sus prendas van creciendo, ya que son más baratas.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder comprar más prendas y así seguir dando buena variedad a sus clientes. Agradece por la ayuda que reciben que es muy importante para ellas.
texts.en:
Kuña Guapa Communal Bank is made up of 10 women who are in their second loan cycle.  The bank formed when various neighbors in the city of Santaní got together.

One of these women is Gabriela, who makes a living selling used clothing with her husband and her two children.  Thanks to their effort, she and her husband give their children everything they need to have a decent life without the hardships they themselves had to suffer.  Gabriela says her business is doing very well; sales of her garments are going up because they're cheaper.

She's requesting this loan to be able to buy more garments to continue giving her customers a good variety.

She's grateful for the help they receive because it's very important to them.

loans.use: to buy used garments

loans.name: Santa Maria Group

texts.es:
Santa Maria es un grupo de Ciudad del Este, tiene 10 integrantes, donde cada una de ellas trabaja y se ayudan para poder salir adelante. Este grupo se destaca porque demuestran muchas ganas de salir adelante y dejar atrás todo aquello que les impida crecer.
Lucina es parte de este grupo, ella se dedica al comercio ya que tiene una despensa bien surtida con todo tipo de productos, ella es una persona que sabe vender muy bien y es por eso que está creciendo. Su meta es poder seguir agrandando su negocio y de esa forma poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
Lucina pide este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas, comestibles, enlatados, lácteos y demás, para poder tener bien surtido su negocio.
El grupo Santa Maria está muy agradecido por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, pues le será de mucha ayuda para poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Santa Maria is a group from the East City.  It’s made up of 10 members, where each of them works and helps one another to get ahead.  This group is highlighted because they show a great desire to get ahead and leave behind everything that prevents them from growing.

Lucina is part of this group and has a well-stocked grocery store with all types of products.  She is a person who knows how to sell well and this is why her business is growing.  Her goal is to be able to continue helping her family.

Lucinda is asking for this loan to be able to buy drinks, food, canned products, milk products, and other things to stock her store.

Santa Maria is very grateful for the opportunity it has received.  It will be very helpful in them getting ahead.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La Señora Gladys de 40 años de edad, está casada con el Sr. Fermín con quien tiene 2 hijos, quienes son el motivo de lucha de esa pareja. Ellos se dedican al macate (venta ambulante) y a la venta de productos para despensas tales como fiambre, azúcar, maíz, afrecho, gaseosas, harina entre otros.
Además se dedica a la cría de gallinas y chanchos en su casa. Es una Señora muy sacrificada y trabajadora su marido el Sr. Fermín es quien le ayuda en su trabajo y juntos luchan para que día a día sigan progresando y aumentando sus ingresos para así poder solventar los estudios de sus dos hijos.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de fiambre, azúcar, maíz, afrecho, gaseosas, etc., con los que podrá seguir trabajando para poder seguir surtiendo a los negocios que visita.
texts.en:
Gladys, 40, is married to Fermín.  They have two children, who are the motivation for that couple's struggles.  They make a living as street vendors and selling products for pantries such as cold cuts, sugar, corn, bran, soda, wheat, and other products.

She also raises chickens and pigs at home.  She's a very self-sacrificing and hardworking woman.  Her husband, Fermín, helps her with her job and together they strive every day to continue making progress and increasing their income to be able to pay the educational expenses of their two children.

She's requesting this loan to buy cold cuts, sugar, corn, bran, soda, etc., with which she'll be able to continue working to be able to stock the businesses she visits.

loans.use: to buy cold cuts, sugar, corn, bran, soda, etc.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en: Juvy is a married mother with three dependents. She lives in Upper Bayao, Tukuran. She owns and operates a general store, which she uses to generate an income of 3,600 PHP per month. She has been in business for two years. Juvy requested a loan of 5,000 PHP from GDMPC. She intends to use the loan to buy items such as milk, diapers, and food products. She has been a member of GDMPC for one year. In the future, she wants to purchase pedicabs for her other business.

loans.use: to buy items such as milk, diapers, and food products

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es:
El Sr. Aurelio tiene 38 años, está casado con la Sra. Ursulina de 38 años de edad tiene una parada de taxis en la ciudad de Itá hace más de 10 años.
El Sr. Aurelio por medio de su trabajo ha podido dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para una buena vida, ya que sabe que la única forma de salir adelante es por medio del trabajo y la lucha. Gracias a este trabajo está creciendo y quiere seguir haciéndolo, es por eso que solicita este  préstamo para completar un ahorro que tenía hace años y comprar un vehículo ya que desea tener uno más nuevo para mayor seguridad suya y la de sus pasajeros, ya que de esa forma dará un mejor servicio.
Aurelio agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo, ya que le será muy útil, no solo a él, sino también a su familia.
texts.en:
Aurelio has been able to provide everything for his family through his work, so that they will have a good life, now that he knows that the only way to get ahead is through hard work and dedication.  Thanks to this business, he is growing and wants to continue doing so.  He is asking for this loan to augment savings that he has had for a long time and buy a vehicle.  He wants to have a second one for better security for himself and for his passengers and provide them better service.

Aurelio is grateful for the help he has received; it has been very helpful, not only for him, but also for his family.

loans.use: to buy another taxi.

loans.name: Mburucuya Group

texts.es:
El comité se encuentra en el Decimo Quinto Ciclo con 20  integrantes. Cada una con sus respectivas actividades productivas, son muy unidas responsables y solidarias entre ellas, desde el principio del grupo han mostrado muchas ganas de superarse y de ser alguien útil para sus familias.
Una de estas mujeres es Aida, quien también es la presidenta de este grupo. Ella vende todo tipo de comidas, que ella misma hace, y le sale muy bien. Tiene ya muy buena clientela, pues sus comidas son muy ricas y aceptadas por la mayoría. Aida quiere tener algún día, un gran salón donde poder seguir dando una buena calidad a sus clientes.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de carnes, condimentos, huevo y demás insumos para seguir con su trabajo, ya que quiere seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
This group is in its 15th cycle with ten members.  Each one has her own business and they are very responsible and united amongst themselves.  They have demonstrated a great desire to succeed to be able to help their families.

Aida is one of the members who also serves as the group’s president.  She sells all kinds of food that she prepares herself and it sells well.  She has good customers and her dishes are delicious and well accepted.  Aida wants to have a large restaurant someday, where she can provide quality service to her customers.

She is asking for this loan to buy meat, condiments, eggs, and other ingredients to continue working and helping her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase athletic shoes to sell

loans.name: Mujeres Todas Juntas Group

texts.es:
20 son las mujeres de la ciudad de Caaguazú, quienes con la esperanza de ayudarse por medio del trabajo y sumado a eso las capacitaciones de la fundación. De esta unión surge el grupo Mujeres todas juntas, que desea salir adelante y superar todos los obstáculos que puedan tener.
Elva es parte de este grupo, y comenta que se dedica a la venta de queso y de leche. Empieza a trabajar desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana para poder cumplir con su clientela desde temprano, ella se ha hecho muy conocida gracias a la buena variedad de los productos que vende.
Elva pide de este crédito para poder comprar queso en cantidad, ya que quiere tener un mejor stock de este producto, ya que se acercan las festividades y quiere estar bien surtida.
texts.en:
These are 20 women from the city of Caaguazú, with the hope of helping themselves by working and adding this to the foundation’s capabilities.  From this idea comes the group “Mujeres Todas Juntas,” whose members want to continue moving forward and overcome all of the obstacles they could have.

Elva is part of this group and says that she sells cheese and milk.  She begins working very early in the morning to be able to meet her customers’ demands.  She has become very well known, thanks to the good variety of products she sells.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy cheese in quantity so that she will have a large stock on hand, now that the year-end festivals are approaching.  She wants to have a good stock.

loans.use: to buy cheese.

loans.name: Mburucuya Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Mburucuya” es un comité de 14 mujeres que están muy bien consolidadas, trabajan y se ayudan mutuamente. Estas señoras son de la ciudad de Villarrica, y todas son vecinas y amigas. Se reúnen brindarse apoyo y a comentar cualquier situación que surja en el grupo.
Estas señoras están muy animadas de seguir participando en este programa de microcredito, pues han mejorado bastante sus ingresos en sus familias. Una de estas mujeres es la Sra. Carmen, quien es peluquera, y comenta que siempre da un buen servicio a su clientela, y que por ello siempre vuelven.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de tintes, spray, juego de tijeras y demás insumos para tener todo lo que le hace falta para dar un buen servicio. Agradece por la ayuda que tiene, pues le será de mucha utilidad.
texts.en:
The “Mburucuya” group is made up of 14 women who are very united, work, and help one-another.  These ladies are from the city of Villarrica and all of them are friends and neighbors.  Them get together to encourage one another and discuss anything that comes up.

They are very motivated to continue participating in this microlending program and their family income has increased significantly.  Carmen is one of these women.  She is a hair stylist and says that she always provides good service to her customers so that they will return.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy tints, hairspray, scissors, and other supplies so that she will have everything she needs to provide good service.  She is grateful for the help she has gotten and it will be very useful.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge Alberto, tiene la edad  de 41 años, está unión libre, vive con su hija y esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de otra en trabajos de preparación del terreno. Además de poder comprar unas plantas de plátano de buena calidad y sanidad para que tengan un buen desarrollo a corto plazo, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de plátano. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jorge Alberto is 41, has a common-law marriage, and lives with his daughter and wife, who are his number one priority. With the loan he plans to purchase fertilizer, fungicide, and pay for hired help to prepare the land. He also plans to purchase high quality, healthy banana trees so that they can develop well in a short period of time. He wants to take advantage of the fertile soil and the favorable climate conditions that support banana cultivation.
 
With these improvements to his crop, he hopes to make a little bit of profit, be able to improve the living conditions of his family, invest more in his area of cultivation, and also accomplish some goals. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not has had other loans in state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him the loan with the best terms and the lowest interest rate.

loans.use: plant bananas

loans.name: Juán Pablo

texts.es: Juán Pablo, tiene la edad  de 30 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de otra en trabajos de asistencia como lo son poda, arreglo de sombra luego una buena deshija para el café.      Además de poder comprar unas plantas de almácigo para realizar resiembras y así aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Juán Pablo is 30 years old, single, and lives with his parents and brothers who are his number one priority.  He will use the money from this loan to buy fertilizers, fungicides, and pay for labor to trim and set up the shade for the coffee.  He will also buy some seedlings in order to replant and increase the density of his plants so that he can take advantage of the fertile soil, the weather, and other things that favor raising coffee.  He expects to have better earnings with these improvements and in this way improve his family’s living conditions and achieve some goals.
This will be his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has granted a loan easily and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings and supplies.

loans.name: Giri Puteri Group

texts.en:
Ni Made will use the loan of 2M IDR to purchase 3 piglets for fattening. Each will cost 450,000 and the rest of the loan will be used to buy pig feed. These piglets will be kept for 5 months and then sold to the buyer. Because it’s nearly holiday season, the price for pigs is increasing. But, she hopes the price for feed is not following the price of pigs.

Ni Made and the members of the Giri Puteri Group know the benefits of having this loan. They can purchase piglets, feed, and pay for training for the breeder. They hope they can have capital on their own and won't need to request another loan. Finally three of the members resigned and followed their husbands to work in the city.

loans.use: to buy three piglets and pig feed.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 65 years old, widowed, and has 4 children. 

Evangeline owns and operates a dressmaking business, where she manufactures and sells clothing products. She has been in this business for 20 years and earns 15,000 a month from it. In 2009, Evangeline joined GDMPC. 

Evangeline is requesting a loan of 30,000, which will be used to buy threads, needles, fabrics, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy threads, needles, fabrics, etc.

loans.name: Mely

texts.en:
Mely is married and has 4 children. She is 40 years old and lives in San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

Mely owns and operates a general store to earn a living. She has been in this business for 8 years. Each month she earns PHP 3,000. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more items such as eggs, noodles, shampoo, soap and toothpaste. 

In 2011, Mely joined GDMPC. In the future, she wants to build a house and complete her children's education.

loans.use: to buy more items such as eggs, noodles, shampoo, soap, and toothpaste.

loans.name: Yamileth

texts.es: Yamileth, tiene la edad  de 46 años, está casada, vive con su esposo que es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes orgánico y cal para mejorar las condiciones del suelo y que el cultivo tenga un buen desarrollo, fungicidas y pagar mano de otra en trabajos de asistencia para el café. Además de poder comprar unas plantas de almácigo para realizar resiembras y así aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Yamileth is 46 years old, married, and lives with her husband who is her main priority.  She will use the money from this loan to buy compost, and calcium to improve the soil so that the crop will develop well.  She will also buy fungicides and pay for labor to help with her coffee crop.  Finally, she will buy seedlings to replant and increase the density of her plants so that she can take advantage of the fertile soil, the climate, and other things that favor the raising of coffee.  With these improvements to her crop, she expects to increase her income a bit and improve her family’s living conditions.  She will also accomplish some goals.

This will be her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has granted a loan easily and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings and supplies.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 50 years old and married. She lives in Sto. Niño, Tukuran, where she has earned a living for the last 7 years by selling home and used products. 

Marilyn makes PHP 4,000 a month and is applying for a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee. Marilyn joined GDMPC in 2009 as a way to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Sung

texts.en:
Sung (pictured above) is a fisherman and farmer. When the rice farming season comes, he grows rice on his farmland in the village where he lives. His wife sells fish that he catches. She also buys additional fish from other fisherman and sells them in the local market. 

Sung and his wife have been married since 2003 and they have two young children: one son and one daughter. 

Sung is applying for a loan of $1,000 to buy seed, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his rice farm.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his rice farm.

loans.name: María Alejandra

texts.es: María Alejandra, tiene la edad  de 21 años, está casada, vive con su hijo esposo  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer preparación del terreno en forma manual para conservar mejor las condiciones del suelo y  la compra de fertilizantes orgánico, fungicidas y pagar mano de otra en trabajos de preparación del suelo para el café. Además de poder comprar unas plantas de almácigo para realizar siembra y así  tener una buena área de café, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
María Alejandra is 21, married, and lives with her husband, who is her highest priority. With the loan, she plans to purchase organic fertilizer, fungicide, and pay for manual labor for the work of preparing the fields for the coffee. She will manually prepare the land to better conserve the soil conditions. She also plans to purchase a few beds of seedlings to plant. She will take advantage of the fertile soil and the favorable climate and other factors that support coffee cultivation to have a good coffee growing area. 

With these improvements to the cultivation, she hopes to earn a little bit of profit, be able to improve the living conditions of her family, invest a little more in her cultivation area, and also achieve some goals. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR. She has not had any previous loans in state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her with a loan with the best terms and the lowest interest rate.

loans.use: begin cultivating coffee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies for his butcher shop

loans.name: Enrique

texts.en:
Enrique, a 58-year-old married father of four children, resides in Militar, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. For five years he has operated a fishing business, selling seafood products including fish and shrimp in the local community, each month earning 13,150 PHP. 

Enrique joined GDMPC in 2011 and is requesting a loan of 25,000 PHP to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets. In the future, he wants to save earnings as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his motorcycle

loans.name: Sophy

texts.en:
Sophy (in the photo) and her husband, Nun, sell mangoes. They buy mangoes under contract from fellow villagers before harvest season and, when the mangoes are fully grown, they take them to sell at the local market.

The couple has been married since 1982 and they have five children. The family is living in a village approximately 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Sophy needs to use pesticides to prevent mangoes from being eaten by insects. Hence, she is applying for a loan in the amount of $500.

loans.use: To purchase pesticides to prevent mangoes from being eaten by insects.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Oyuntsetseg

texts.en: Oyuntsetseg is 40 years old and lives with her husband and two children in a small house in Chingiltei district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband Olziishur, age 40, provides transportation service back and forth to a mining company from Ulaanbaatar city. Her son Enhbat, age 18, is a university student and her daughter Enhtsetseg, age 15, is a secondary school student. She has been working as a hairdresser for the last 14 years in a rental place in a barbershop. She is now planning to open her own barbershop to increase her sales volume and profit. She has already built a strong client base and it will be easier for her to increase sales. She is now requesting 1,500,000 MNT to purchase necessary equipment and tools for her newly starting barbershop business. She is a hardworking and optimistic person.

loans.use: to purchase necessary equipment and tools for her newly starting barbershop business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more spices and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more bananas to resell

loans.name: Fatima

texts.ru: Фатима 53 лет, мать 5 детей двух девочек и 3 сына. Средний сын погиб, остальные взрослые и работают сами дочки замужем, старший сын живет с Фатимой. Фатима вдова, муж Фатимы скоропостижно скончался в 1991 году. Они начинали свой бизнес с мужем, после его смерти она осталась с детьми одна со всеми житейскими проблемами. Несмотря на все проблемы она остается все такой же жизнерадостной и веселой. Она твердо уверена в светлое будущее своей семьи. Фатима в качестве основного источника дохода для семьи занимается животноводством. Начатое много лет назад они с мужем купили 2 нетели за 60,000 сом (KGS) на сегодняшний день у неё в хозяйстве имеется 2 дойные коровы и 20 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 6,000 сом (KGS)от продажи молока и молочной продукции. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Фатима обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и теленка. Доходы Фатима планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйство и хотела бы обеспечить образованием внуков.
texts.en: Fatima is 53 years old and she is the mother of five children: two daughters and three sons.  Her middle son has died, but the rest of the children are grown up and are working; her daughters are married and her eldest son lives with her.  Fatima is a widow - her husband died suddenly in 1991.  She started her business with her husband and after he died she was left alone with the all the household problems.  Despite all the troubles, Fatima is still lively and cheerful.  She firmly believes in a bright future for her family.  Fatima is involved in animal husbandry, which is the main source of income for her family.  She started this may years ago when she and her husband purchased two heifers for 60,000 som (KGS) and she now has two dairy cows and 20 sheep on her farm.  Her monthly income from the farm is about 6,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products.  To further increase her business, Fatima has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow and one calf.  She plans to use the proceeds from the loan to increase her farm's capacity and she would like to pay for her grandchildren's education.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and a calf.

loans.name: Nurisa

texts.ru: Нурисе 48 лет, воспитывает 4 детей. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, они с мужем начали свой бизнес с приобретения 5 голов овец для откорма и перепродажи. Благодаря упорному труду Нурисы, ее хозяйство на сегодняшний день насчитывает одна дойная корова и  один жеребец.По мимо этого она обрабатывает 0,9 га земли где ежегодно сажает фасолдь и картофель.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуриса обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы. Доходы Нуриса планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, в будущем мечтает сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en: Nurisa is 48 years old and has four children at home.  In search of a source of income for their family, Nurisa and her husband started their business with the purchase of five sheep to fatten and resell.  Thanks to Nurisa's hard work, her farm now includes a dairy cow and a stallion.  She also works on .9 hecatares of land where she annually plants beans and potatoes.  With the goal of developing her business over the future, Nurisa turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow.  Nursa plans to use this income to further increase her head of livestock, and in the future she dreams of making repairs to her home.

loans.use: To purchase one cow

loans.use: to pay for multi-cab maintenance

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Abakozi Group

texts.fr:
Jacqueline fait partie du groupe Abakozi et   habite à Gitega. Elle  a   32 ans et est mariée à Valentin, un vendeur de chèvres. Ensemble ils ont  4 enfants dont 3 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de chèvres  depuis 3 ans. 

Elle  est à son  dixième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de chèvres à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Les bénéfices  de son commerce  lui ont permis d’acheter une vache.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is a member of the Abakozi group and lives in Gitega. She is 32 years old and is married to Valentin, a goat seller. The couple have 4 children together, 3 of whom go to school.

Jacqueline has been selling goats for 3 years. The is her 10th loan from Turame. Her Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her capital and allow her to buy many goats for resale, so that she can earn more. The profits from her business have enabled her to buy a cow.

loans.use: to buy many goats for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Tomorhuyag

texts.en: Tomorhuyag is 55 years old. He lives with wife and 2 children in a ger in Hovd Province, Mongolia. His wife, Altanchimeg, operates small retail store in the local market. His 2 younger sons, Enhbold and Monh-Erdene, are university students. The borrower has been operating a blacksmith shop since 2000. His wife and he have obtained lot of experience within the industry and built strong relationships with customers over the years. He paid his 2 older children's tuition and living expenses, and they got married and moved out. He is now requesting 6,000,000 MNT to cover his 2 younger sons' university tuition fees and living expenses. He and his wife are hardworking, responsible, well-behaved people.

loans.use: to cover his 2 younger sons' university tuition fees and living expenses.

loans.name: Uranchimeg

texts.en: Uranchimeg is 41 years old lives with her husband and daughter in a ger in Tosontsengel sum, Zavhan Province, Mongolia. Her husband Batbileg helps with his wife's shoe manufacturing business; he is also planning to purchase car to start providing taxi service within the area. Her daughter Goomaral, age 6, has just entered primary school this September. She has been operating her shoe manufacturing business since 2008. She is well-known and in high demand among clients within the area. She is now requesting 1,000,000 MNT to purchase inventory to produce seasonal winter boots to increase her sales volume and profit. She is a diligent and hardworking woman.

loans.use: to purchase materials to produce seasonal winter boots.

loans.name: Dieu Peut Tout 1 Group

texts.fr: " DIEU PEUT TOUT 1 " est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres sont des amies et résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Akouavi Charlotte est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Akouavi Charlotte est âgée de 31 ans et est mariée à Germain. Akouavi Charlotte n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Le couple à cinq enfants, tous scolarisés. Akouavi Charlotte et Germain vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants et assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Akouavi Charlotte vend des fagots de bois et des sacs dans une région du Bénin. Akouavi Charlotte s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Cette activité lui permet de subvenir sans grande difficulté, à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Pour rehausser le niveau de son activité, Akouavi Charlotte désire augmenter son stock, acheter des sacs et des fagots de bois. Pour ce faire, Akouavi Charlotte et les autres membres du groupe " DIEU PEUT TOUT 1 " sollicitent pour une première fois, l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
"Dieu peut tout 1" is a group of 3 people whose members are friends and live in the same district. The group's leader, Akouavi Charlotte, is the one with her hand raised in the picture. Akouavi Charlotte is 31 years old and married to Germain. She did not go to school. The couple have 5 children, all of whom attend school. Akouavi Charlotte and Germain live together with their children and take care of the different household responsibilities together.

Akouavi Charlotte sells bundles of wood and bags in a region of Benin. She gets her supplies at a market in Benin. This business allows her to meet her needs and those of her children without too much difficulty. In order to increase her level of business, Akouavi Charlotte and the other members of the "Dieu peut tout 1" group are requesting financial support from ALIDé for the first time, with a view to better meeting the demands of their customers.

loans.use: to buy bundles of wood and bags.

loans.name: Farah's Group

texts.en:
Farah is a 50-year-old widow with 2 daughters. Her husband died when her children were at an early age. Since then, she has been looking after her children and paying all the household expenses alone. Her elder daughter is married and the second one is a middle school student. 

From the past 4 years she has been running her own beauty salon, which is the only source of income for the family. She faced a very difficult time after the death of her husband, but she still worked to provide for the family needs. She works 6 hours a day. In spite of working full time, she takes care of all the housework and makes sure that she can fulfill all of her children's needs. All of the income from her business goes to the household expenses; because of this, she is unable to save anything for her children’s future. 

Currently, the stock of her beauty salon is low, and she wants to purchase makeup kits, facial creams, hair colors and other cosmetic products. However, due to financial constraints, she is facing some problems with purchasing the needed items.

Therefore, Farah as a member of this 6-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to continue her beauty salon.

Farah hopes that the loan will be beneficial to them. 

Note: In the picture Farah holds a passbook in her hand.

loans.use: to purchase makeup kits, facial creams, hair colors and other cosmetic products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Mahugnon 9 Group

texts.fr: " MAHUGNON 9 " est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres sont des amies et résident dans la même région. La représentante du groupe, Anne-Marie Ablavi est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Anne-Marie Ablavi est âgée de 43 ans. Anne-Marie Ablavi n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Anne-Marie Ablavi est mariée à Emmanuel. Le couple à quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Anne-Marie Ablavi et Emmanuel vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants et assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Anne-Marie Ablavi vend des condiments et de huile végétale à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Anne-Marie Ablavi vend du maïs. Anne-Marie Ablavi s’approvisionne dans un  marché du Bénin. Cette activité lui permet de subvenir sans grande difficulté à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Anne-Marie Ablavi voudrait renforcer le niveau de son activité. Pour ce faire, Anne-Marie Ablavi et les autres membres du groupe " MAHUGNON 9 " sollicitent pour une quatrième fois, l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
"Mahugnon 9" is a group of 3 people whose members are friends and live in the same region. The group's leader, Anne-Marie Ablavi, is the one with her hand raised in the picture. Anne-Marie Ablavi is 43 years old. She did not go to school. Anne-Marie Ablavi is married to Emmanuel. The couple have 4 dependent children, all of whom attend school. Anne-Marie Ablavi and Emmanuel live together with their children and take care of the different household responsibilities together.

Anne-Marie Ablavi sells condiments and vegetable oil from her home. She also sells corn as a sideline business. She gets her supplies at a market in Benin. This business allows her to meet her needs and those of her children without too much difficulty. 

Anne-Marie Ablavi would like to increase her level of business. In order to do this, she and the other members of the "Mahugnon 9" group are requesting financial support from ALIDé for the fourth time, with a view to strengthening their businesses and better meeting the demands of their customers. The previous loans have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags of corn and peanut oil.

loans.name: Toni

texts.en:
Toni is the owner of The Elite and Performing Arts Center in Woodland Hills. She offers dance classes, birthday parties, and she sells dancewear for adults and children.  The staff offers ballet, tap, jazz, hip-hop, ballroom, acrobatics, and even Zumba classes for children and adults. 

Most of the marketing is done through word of mouth and social media but Toni does send out mailers, post cards, and brochures to different schools in the community. She has hired one staff member as Marketing Manager to help her contact different schools, attend all school events, and market the company's dance classes. 

The Elite Dance and Performing Arts Center Inc. is seeking a $10,000 loan to pay three months of rent while they renovate an extra room in the studio to add more dance classes.

loans.use: To pay three months of rent while they renovate an extra room in the studio to add more dance classes

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.en:
Arsenia is a 63-year-old married woman with eight grown children from Duero, Bohol. She has been engaged in farming and gardening for 20 years now together with her husband. She earns 2,000 PHP monthly. This is the source of her income.

Arsenia is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, seedlings and nylon. Through this loan, she can continue planting crops and have a good production. In the future, Arsenia dreams of expanding her business and being productive.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seedlings and nylon.

loans.name: 3.14.208.thiệu Khánh Group

texts.en:
Hà, 36, operates a food stall/restaurant. She is married with two children.  Her business is located in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Hà has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  She is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to resell.

Hà is the group leader of the 3.14.208.Thiệu Khánh solidarity group, which consists of three members. 

This is Hà's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns Hà is the lack of capital.

With her profits, Hà hopes to keep her family healthy and happy.  She also want her children to do well in school.  Hà also hopes to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods,snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is a 49 year old married woman with six minor children, from Jagna, Bohol.  She has operated a sari sari (variety store) business for 10 years.  This is the source of her income.  Her husband is a driver.

Emma is requesting for a loan to buy items like toiletries, canned goods, noodles, food snack and more. 

Through this loan, she will be able to put many more items in her store and attract the interest of customers in her local community.

Emma hopes to expand her business and become more profitable in the future. She wants to send all her children to school and for them to have a better education.

loans.use: to buy items like toiletries, can goods, noodles. food snacks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy cloth, beads, and thread for making and selling laces (an embroidered product)

loans.name: Twegondezehamu Group

texts.en:
Yusuf is a married man aged 33 with two children and taking care of two dependents. He is a mechanic and also sells spare parts. He started his business in 2003, and his intention was to have a source of income to be able to look after the family.

Yusuf wants the loan to buy bicycle spare parts so that he can meet the demand of his clients. Many people there use bicycles as their major means of transport. He will get income to meet the family needs. He has a challenge with the transport and sometimes the delay in supply because of frequent orders due to limited capital. 

Yusuf's future prospects when he gets this loan are to increase his income and help those who drop out of the school with the mechanical skills since he is a skilled person in mechanics.

loans.use: To buy bicycle spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.use: To buy embroidery materials for an embroidery business.

loans.name: 3.11.214.thiệu Ngọc Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to resell. 

Liên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. Liên is 33 years old and she is married with two children. Liên supports two dependents with her business in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Liên is the group leader of the 3.11.214.Thiệu Ngọc solidarity group, which consists of six members. In 2011, Liên  joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Liên  has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Liên hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain  a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to resell.

loans.name: 3.14.209.thiệu Khánh Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lâm has a service business selling clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase clothing to resell. 

Lâm is 35 years old and she is married with two  children. Lâm supports two dependents with her business in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Lâm has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Lâm is the group leader of the 3.14.209.Thiệu Khánh  solidarity group, which consists of five members. In 2012, Lâm joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Lâm has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. 

With her business profit, Lâm hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain  a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To service the vehicle.

loans.name: 3.10. 211. Thiệu Chính Group

texts.en:
Hiền, 39, is is the leader of the 3.10. 211 Thiệu Chính solidarity group, which consists of three members.  The group is situated in the Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Hiền is married with three children. 

She has been a poultry and cattle farmer for more than 10 years.  Hiền is requesting a loan to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in the future.  This is Hiền first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

One of the group's most critical business difficulties concerns a lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hiền hopes to maintain a successful business, and be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in future.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is aged sixty-one. A farmer, she lives in Litein county in Kenya, with her husband. She has eight children who have all finished schooling. She has been practicing mixed farming for the past twenty years producing maize, tea and milk which she sells at the local market in her area.

She is requesting a 30,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds from which she will sell the products and earn extra income which will help her uplift her livelihood. She aspires to build a dairy unit for her dairy cows in the next five years.

Pests and diseases are her major challenges in farming. Eunice is very thankful to Juhudi Kilimo for funding her with the loan.

loans.use: To purchase poultry birds.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 34 years old and married with three children. She is from Poblacion, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. Josephine does hog-raising to make a living. She has been in her business for three years and earns 10,000 PHP a month. 

Josephine joined GDMPC in 2011. Josephine is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to purchase livestock feed and other supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated with her loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and other supplies.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 59 years old, married. and has four children. She is from Inasagan, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. 

Lolita owns and operates a hog-raising business to earn a living. Lolita has been in business for four years and she earns 4,000 PHP a month. 

In 2009, Lolita joined GDMPC. Lolita is requesting a loan of 6,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase feeding supplies. Lolita wants to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feeding supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Guadioso

texts.en:
Guadioso, 50 years old, is a married entrepreneur of Anonang, Aurora, with two children.

He has had a transport service business for almost three years now and he earns 6,000 PHP a month. 

To improve business, he wants to borrow 15,000 PHP from GDMPC microcredit, which he joined in 2011, to obtain accessories and tires. Before long, he’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding his business.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en: Gayane lives in Sayat Nova village with her parents. She studies international relations at Yerevan State University. Her parents are simple working people and their income doesn't allow them to pay for Gayane's education. So Gayane has applied for the loan to pay for her tuition. The loan will help her to complete her education and become a good specialist. Gayane dreams to find a well-paying job and help her parents to sustain the family.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a resident of Kilifi, Coast province, Kenya. She is a single mother of three school going children. Janet runs a food cafe, a business that she has been running for four years. She also runs a poultry/livestock farm and a green grocery stall.
She learnt about Milango from an employee and joined the institution with an aim of accessing credit to improve the operations of her business. Her main challenge is lack of funds to grow the business and fluctuating prices.
Janet is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenya shillings to purchase food items for the café and to rebuild a poultry shelter. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve on the living standard of her family, especially the education of her children. She aspires to own a café in future.

loans.use: To purchase food items for the café and rebuild a poultry shelter.

loans.name: Kipkoech

texts.en:
Kipkoech is a forty-four year old farmer in Litein County, Kenya where he lives with his wife and five children who are all in school.  He has been farming for the past twelve years producing beans, potatoes, maize and milk which he sells at the local market in his area.
He is requesting a loan for 60,000 KES to construct a dairy unit for his dairy cows, which will assist him in taking better care of his animals and thus getting more production.  This will earn him extra income to help him pay for his children's schooling and uplift his living standards.  He aspires to buy two more cows in the next five years.
Kipkoech is very grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for the funds and is willing to work even harder to be able to get more in the future that will help him grow his farm.

loans.use: To purchase materials for constructing a dairy unit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase shavers and other business equipment.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en: Emelia is from Anonang, Aurora. She is 56 years old. Emelia is married and has 4 children. To make a living, she manages a business buying and selling fish and crabs. She has been in her business for 3 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month from these activities. In 2011, Emelia joined GDMPC.
